home.parrafo-info:
I am a Multiplatform Applications Developer and a student of the Advanced Full Stack Development course.
I aspire to get a job in the field of application development, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a Multiplatform Applications Developer and a student of the Advanced Full Stack Development Course.
I aspire to get a job in the field of Web Development, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and continuously improving myself.

formacion.title: Education
formacion.formacion1: Technician in Industrial Automation and Robotics

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A simulation of the AlertaCoches website using Flet and Docker, allowing for a multiplatform app that can generate installables for Android and iOS.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most notable projects, my technical skills, and a bit about my education.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An application in Android Studio using JetPack Compose, including its main functions.

contacto.title: Contact
contacto.text: Fill out the following form, and I will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
